declarations.text: I am blessed in my coming in and blessed going out.
I am empowered by God's grace, equipping me to fulfill my destiny.
I am a victorious warrior, walking confidently into my destiny.
I am on a journey to fulfill my destiny, guided by God's perfect plan.
I am not limited by circumstances; I am empowered to fulfill my destiny.
I am a warrior for righteousness, advancing God's kingdom through my destiny.
I am unshaken by adversity, for my destiny is secure in Christ.
I am called to a purpose greater than myself; I will fulfill my destiny.
I am a vessel of God's grace, destined to bring His love to the world.
I am a warrior of faith, conquering obstacles on the path to my destiny.
I am an heir of God's promises, walking boldly into my destiny.
I am a light in the darkness, leading others toward their destinies.
Jesus is the Rescuer, saving me from a life without destiny.
Jesus is the Door, opening the way to my destined future.
Jesus is the Great I Am, declaring the fulfillment of my destiny.
Jesus is the King of Kings, ruling over my destiny with sovereignty.
Thank you, Jesus, for being the Word of God, speaking truth into my destiny.
Jesus is the Great Intercessor, praying for the fulfillment of my destiny.
Thank you, Jesus, for being the Prince of Peace, calming every storm on my destiny's voyage.
Jesus is the Mighty Warrior, fighting battles for my destiny.
Jesus is the Alpha and Omega, orchestrating every detail of my destiny.
Jesus is the Rock on which I stand, unshaken on my journey to destiny.
Jesus is the Author and Finisher of my faith, ensuring the fulfillment of my destiny.
Thank you, Jesus, for being my Redeemer and restoring my destiny.
'For I know the plans I have for you,' declares the Lord, 'plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.'
Many are the plans in a person's heart, but it is the Lord's purpose that prevails.
Take delight in the Lord, and he will give you the desires of your heart.
And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.
In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.
I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go; I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.
Whatever I do prospers, I am like a tree planted by the water.
I am successful because I meditate on God's Word day and night.
The favor of God surrounds me like a shield.
My steps are ordered by the Lord, and He delights in my way.
I have the mind of Christ and hold the thoughts, feelings, and purposes of His heart.
I am confident of this very thing, that He who has begun a good work in me will complete it.
I am made complete with God by my side.
I seek first the kingdom of God and His righteousness, and all these things are added to me.
My God supplies all my needs!
I am seated with Christ in heavenly places.
I am God's masterpiece, and the evil one can not defeat me.
I overcome the world through my faith in Jesus.
I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.
I am blessed because Jesus conquered the world.
I am chosen by God.
I am victorious because of Jesus.
I am more than a conqueror!
I am the head and not the tail.
I am above and never beneath.
As Jesus is in Heaven, so AM I in this world!
No weapon formed against me will prosper!
I have the mind of Christ!
My youth is renewed everyday!
I am grateful for a new day!
I am thankful for my vision.
I am thankful for my senses.
I am thankful for my mind.
I am thankful for my body.
I am thankful I made it over all my past storms.
I trample upon lions and cobras and crush them under my feet.
This is the day the Lord has made I will be happy and enjoy it.
I speak back to every circumstance that doesn't line up with my destiny.
Jesus conquered hell just for me.
I already won because I'm going to Heaven!
My name is written in the Book of Life!
I am making decisions everyday that will lead me to fulfill my destiny.
I am filled with wisdom.
I move in peace and joy no matter the circumstance.
I talk to God about my problems.
God is my best problem solver.
I trust in God.
I invite God to help me with every detail of my life.
I am a warrior!
I may fail, but God picks me back up.
Nothing is to big for God.
Everyday is a new chance to move closer to my destiny.
I learn from my mistakes.
I take action everyday.
I never stop learning with God.
I take care of my body.
I love the journey I am on.
Life is a gift and I'm thankful for every moment and chapter.
Through the highs and lows I trust God.
Abundance is a part of my inheritance.
Great health is a part of my inheritance.
Joy and gratitude is how I rise above every storm.
Jesus died for me to have a great life and bless others.
I am confident, trustworthy, and fearless.
I have a vision for my life.
I am beyond blessed because I am alive.
I guard my heart and mind from things that will tear me down.
God wants me to prosper!
I am faithful and grateful over what God gives me.
God is developing my character so I can handle what I'm asking for.
I ask God to direct all my steps.
I have it in me to reach the potential God set for me.
There is power in my words, so I carefully choose what to say.
God and I, are in a partnership to fulfill my destiny!
I can change the atmosphere with my words.
I am bold as a lion!
I pray all day, everyday.
I am a 1 of 1.
I am unstoppable.
God gave me an assignment, and I will fulfill it.
I take massive action that aligns with my goals.
I am honorable.
I am who God says I am.
I refuse to waste time, energy, or money on things not aligned with my God-given destiny.
It's time to fly like an eagle!
I can never be alone when the Creator of the Universe is at my side.
I have great focus and vision for my life.
God is faithful to all of his promises!
God is willing to bless me bigger than what I think, so I think BIG thoughts.
I love who I am becoming.
I choose to follow God.
I run towards my destiny.
I confidently and joyfully conquer the challenges in front of me.
I walk in integrity in all areas of my life.
I know all my work will bear much fruit.
I am growing with God everyday!
I don't fear the future, God is there too!
My mind is a gift and I guard it with my life.
My mind is alert.
I make great decisions.
I boldly run towards my dreams.
I stay positive no matter how many setbacks occur.
I have a great purpose to fulfill.
God has a great plan for my life.
I go where God says go!
When I follow God's path, goodness will follow me.
I make the right choices at the right time.
I make plans and take action everyday to fulfill them.
My mind is made up, I always find positivity and peace.
I was created to stand out.
I was created to be different than the crowd.
I keep a positive attitude when things don't go my way.
I respond like a winner.
I was born to be a champion.
I am a child of the King.
I am no longer limited in my mind.
New doors of opportunity are always opening.
I am watching my destiny unfold.
I am getting revenge on the enemy.
God's word is stronger than any weapon.
I make wise choices that benefit my future.
I was created to be different than the crowd.
I have great patience and resolve.
I am loved greatly by the Creator of the Universe.
I am a victorious warrior.
God is always preparing the way for me.
I pursue my destiny everyday.
God lives in me!
I praise the Lord for all he has done.
I draw near to God, and He draws near to me.
I always have choices to make so I choose wisely.
God has amazing things in store for me.
Nothing can stop me.
God is my defender and fights my battles.
The time for abundance starts now!
I am showered with favor.
Everything I put my hands to prospers.
I am alive and winning.
I am forever young.
I went through the fire and came out not even smelling like smoke.
I am designed for a great, abundant, and peaceful life.
I do things that help transform people's lives.
I bring value into every project I am part of.
The time is now.
God is with me at this moment.
I will take action on the things I have been putting off.
God's goodness and protection follow me everywhere.
I spread joy and smiles everywhere I go.
I change the atmosphere because God is with me.
I release words of positivity to and over people.
I have contagious faith.
My faith in God is the reason I thrive.
I have power and authority.
Life and Death is in the power of the tongue.
I speak life into my future.
My best days are still to come.
I only speak positive things.
When I pray, heaven is listening.
My words can heal.
I give my worries to God.
I stand on God's promises.
I have no lack in any area.
All I see is abundance.
I am helping others see their new identity in Jesus.
I refuse to lose.
I am a money magnet.
My family is guarded by angels.
I have supernatural provision.
I declare anything blocking my blessings must be removed.
I declare new opportunities are on the way.
I declare my generational curses are now broken.
I meditate on God's promises.
I declare I will receive my full inheritance!
My family walks in peace and wisdom.
Me and My family will serve the Lord.
I speak life and blessing into people around me.
I speak life as a part of my identity.
God is connecting me with the right people.
I will always be kind.
I don't allow situations to control my emotions.
Even if I don't see a way, doesn't mean God doesn't have a way.
I remove all negative labels and replace them with what I truly am, a masterpiece.
I am loved by the Most High.
I am in alignment with my destiny.
My actions are in alignment with my goals.
My thoughts align with my goals.
Jesus died for me to have a long, joyful, abundant life.
I am healed.
Health and wealth are mine.
Every cell of my body is being renewed everyday.
I remove all doubts with prayer and action.
When I'm focused, I can't be stopped.
I get all the answers I need from the Holy Spirit who lives within me.
My confidence is rising.
I am capable.
I love my unique qualities.
I will not waste today.
My destiny is a canvas, and I am the artist.
I am resilient and I adapt to align with my destiny.
I am grateful for the journey that leads me to my destiny.
I am filled with joy knowing I am following my destined path.
Every day, I move closer to fulfilling my destiny.
I am continuously evolving to meet my destiny.
I am a magnet for experiences that propel me towards my destiny.
I embrace the lessons that guide me towards my destiny.
Every moment is an opportunity to align closer with my destiny.
I am destined to live a life full of passion and purpose.
I surround myself around people and resources that help align me with my destiny.
My destiny is not a matter of chance, it's a matter of choice.
I am courageous in pursuing my destiny.
Every challenge I complete brings me a step closer to my destiny.
My destiny unfolds as I live authentically.
I release fear and embrace the unknown steps of my destiny.
I am destined for greatness and I embrace it fully.
I am actively shaping my destiny with every choice I make.
My actions today are stepping stones towards my ultimate destiny.
I trust in my journey and know I am on the right path.
I trust in the Lord’s plan for my life, knowing He guides my path.
God’s strength empowers me to fulfill my destiny.
I walk by faith, not by sight, aligned with God's purpose.
I am guided by God's wisdom in my decisions towards my destiny.
I embrace the promises of God, aligning my life with His word.
I am patient, knowing God's timing is perfect for my destiny.
I walk in obedience to God, aligning with His divine purpose.
My faith in God opens doors to my destined path.
God’s grace is more than enough for me to reach my destiny.
I am equipped by God to accomplish great things.
I am confident in my God-given abilities to achieve my destiny.
I seek God's kingdom first, trusting all else will align.
I am renewed daily by God’s word, aligning with His will.
I am a co-creator with God in my life’s destiny.
I am constantly growing and learning in God’s wisdom.
I trust in God with all my heart.
I am secure in God’s love, which leads me to my true purpose.
I am in tune with God’s voice, directing me towards my destiny.
I am living proof to God’s grace, living out my divine destiny.
I am chosen by God to fulfill a unique and special destiny.
I love the destiny God has prepared for me.
I am a living example of God’s love, fulfilling my destiny.
I am continuously molded by God to fit my divine purpose.
God’s favor surrounds me as I journey towards my destiny.
For by grace you have been saved through faith. And this is not your own doing; it is the gift of God.
But God shows his love for us in that while we were still sinners, Christ died for us.
Let us then with confidence draw near to the throne of grace, that we may receive mercy and find grace to help in time of need.
For the grace of God has appeared, bringing salvation for all people.
And from his fullness we have all received, grace upon grace.

But he said to me, 'My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.' Therefore I will boast all the more gladly of my weaknesses, so that the power of Christ may rest upon me.
So that, as sin reigned in death, grace also might reign through righteousness leading to eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.
Out of his fullness we have all received grace in place of grace already given.
The grace of the Lord Jesus be with God’s people. Amen.
For sin will have no dominion over you, since you are not under law but under grace.
Grace and peace be multiplied to you in the knowledge of God and of Jesus our Lord.
But to each one of us grace has been given as Christ apportioned it.
I do not set aside the grace of God, for if righteousness could be gained through the law, Christ died for nothing!
You then, my child, be strengthened by the grace that is in Christ Jesus.
For from his fullness we have all received, grace upon grace.
And are justified by his grace as a gift, through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus.
May grace and peace be multiplied to you in the knowledge of God and of Jesus our Lord.
Therefore, since we have been justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ.
In him we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of our trespasses, according to the riches of his grace.
The Lord is gracious and righteous; our God is full of compassion.
Therefore, as you received Christ Jesus the Lord, so walk in him.
For if by the one man's offense death reigned through the one, much more those who receive abundance of grace and of the gift of righteousness will reign in life through the One, Jesus Christ.
But where sin increased, grace increased all the more.
To the praise of his glorious grace, which he has freely given us in the One he loves.
And God is able to make all grace abound to you, so that having all sufficiency in all things at all times, you may abound in every good work.
He has saved us and called us to a holy life—not because of anything we have done but because of his own purpose and grace.
For the law was given through Moses; grace and truth came through Jesus Christ.
We have different gifts, according to the grace given to each of us.
Through him we have also obtained access by faith into this grace in which we stand, and we rejoice in hope of the glory of God.
Let your speech always be gracious, seasoned with salt, so that you may know how you ought to answer each person.
Praise be to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us in the heavenly realms with every spiritual blessing in Christ.
But grow in the grace and knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ. To him be glory both now and forever! Amen.
The Lord longs to be gracious to you; therefore he will rise up to show you compassion.
Whoever does not love does not know God, because God is love.
My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.
In me, you will find rest for your soul, for my yoke is easy and my burden is light.
Abide in me, and I in you. As the branch cannot bear fruit by itself, unless it abides in the vine, neither can you, unless you abide in me.
Ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.
Do not worry about your life, what you will eat or drink; or about your body, what you will wear. Is not life more than food, and the body more than clothes?
Come to me, all who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
I am the vine; you are the branches. Whoever abides in me and I in him, he it is that bears much fruit, for apart from me you can do nothing.
Let not your hearts be troubled. Believe in God; believe also in me.
Peace I leave with you; my peace I give to you. Not as the world gives do I give to you. Let not your hearts be troubled, neither let them be afraid.
I have told you these things, so that in me you may have peace. In this world you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world.
Whoever comes to me I will never cast out.
If you abide in my word, you are truly my disciples, and you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.
With man this is impossible, but with God all things are possible.
I am the way, and the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.
I am the light of the world. Whoever follows me will not walk in darkness, but will have the light of life.
If anyone thirsts, let him come to me and drink. Whoever believes in me, as the Scripture has said, 'Out of his heart will flow rivers of living water.'
Behold, I am with you always, to the end of the age.
Your faith has made you well; go in peace, and be healed of your disease.
I came not to call the righteous, but sinners.
Take my yoke upon you, and learn from me, for I am gentle and lowly in heart, and you will find rest for your souls.
You did not choose me, but I chose you and appointed you that you should go and bear fruit and that your fruit should abide.
In my Father's house are many rooms. If it were not so, would I have told you that I go to prepare a place for you?
I tell you, her sins, which are many, are forgiven—for she loved much. But he who is forgiven little, loves little.
Everyone who exalts himself will be humbled, and he who humbles himself will be exalted.
Fear not, little flock, for it is your Father's good pleasure to give you the kingdom.
I have come that they may have life, and have it to the full.
You are the light of the world. A city set on a hill cannot be hidden.
Freely you have received; freely give.
I tell you, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers and sisters of mine, you did for me.
I am the resurrection and the life. The one who believes in me will live, even though they die.
So therefore, any one of you who does not renounce all that he has cannot be my disciple.
Truly, truly, I say to you, whoever hears my word and believes him who sent me has eternal life. He does not come into judgment, but has passed from death to life.
If you keep my commandments, you will abide in my love, just as I have kept my Father's commandments and abide in his love.
I am more than a conqueror through Him who loves me.
I am strong and courageous, not frightened or dismayed, for the Lord my God is with me wherever I go.
I am equipped for every good work through His divine power.
I am a child of God, born not of flesh but of His Spirit.
I am a light in the darkness, shining His truth and love.
I am redeemed and forgiven, living in the freedom of His grace.
I am a new creation; the old has gone, the new has come.
I am chosen, holy, and dearly loved, clothed in His strength and dignity.
I am set apart for His divine purposes, walking in His mighty power.
I am a warrior in His army, standing firm against the schemes of the devil.
I am not given a spirit of fear, but of power, love, and a sound mind.
I am healed by His wounds, walking in health and wholeness.
I am rooted and established in His love, comprehending its vastness.
I am seated in heavenly places with Christ Jesus, far above all principality.
I am shielded by His grace, extinguishing all the flaming darts of the evil one.
I am an overcomer by the blood of the Lamb and the word of my testimony.
I am the salt of the earth, preserving His goodness and spreading His flavors of grace.
I am unshaken in my faith, standing steadfast on His unchanging promises.
I am called according to His purpose, working all things for good.
I am a temple of the Holy Spirit, carrying His presence wherever I go.
I am clothed with the armor of God, standing firm against all adversities.
I am a co-heir with Christ, inheriting the riches of His glory.
I am filled with the strength of Christ, enduring all things with patience.
I am walking by faith, not by sight, trusting in His sovereign plan.
I am a disciple of Christ, taking up my cross daily to follow Him.
I am guided by His truth, His word a lamp unto my feet and a light unto my path.
I am sustained by the bread of life, never hungering as I feast on His word.
I am cleansed by His blood, purified from all unrighteousness.
I am steadfast, immovable, always abounding in the work of the Lord.
I am bearing fruit in every season, flourishing in the courts of my God.
I am a living sacrifice, holy and pleasing to God - this is my true worship.
I am walking in the Spirit, not gratifying the desires of the flesh.
I am the righteousness of God in Christ, justified by faith and walking in peace.
Through Jesus' grace, I am redeemed and live in victory.
And whatever you ask in prayer, you will receive, if you have faith.
For we walk by faith, not by sight.
But without faith it is impossible to please Him, for he who comes to God must believe that He is, and that He is a rewarder of those who diligently seek Him.
I have fought the good fight, I have finished the race, I have kept the faith.
So faith comes from hearing, and hearing through the word of Christ.
For by grace you have been saved through faith. And this is not your own doing; it is the gift of God.
Let us hold fast the confession of our hope without wavering, for He who promised is faithful.
Be on guard. Stand firm in the faith. Be courageous. Be strong.
Trust in the LORD with all your heart, and do not lean on your own understanding.
Jesus said to him, 'If you can believe, all things are possible to him who believes.'
I can do all things through Him who strengthens me.
And let us run with endurance the race that is set before us, looking unto Jesus, the founder and perfecter of our faith.
Now faith is the assurance of things hoped for, the conviction of things not seen.
For everyone who has been born of God overcomes the world. And this is the victory that has overcome the world—our faith.
Jesus said to her, 'Did I not tell you that if you believed you would see the glory of God?'
But you, O man of God, flee these things and pursue righteousness, godliness, faith, love, patience, gentleness.
Fight the good fight of the faith. Take hold of the eternal life to which you were called when you made your good confession in the presence of many witnesses.
Looking to Jesus, the founder and perfecter of our faith, who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross, despising the shame, and is seated at the right hand of the throne of God.
In all circumstances take up the shield of faith, with which you can extinguish all the flaming darts of the evil one.
And whatever you ask in prayer, you will receive, if you have faith.
For nothing will be impossible with God.
Blessed is she who believed that there would be a fulfillment of what was spoken to her from the Lord.
The life I now live in the flesh I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave Himself for me.
Jesus looked at them and said, 'With man it is impossible, but not with God. For all things are possible with God.'
Therefore I tell you, whatever you ask in prayer, believe that you have received it, and it will be yours.
You are all sons of God through faith in Christ Jesus.
This is the confidence we have in approaching God: that if we ask anything according to His will, He hears us.
And Jesus said to him, 'Go your way; your faith has made you well.' And immediately he recovered his sight and followed him on the way.
Therefore, since we have been justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ.
Because you are sons, God has sent the Spirit of his Son into our hearts, crying, 'Abba! Father!'
Jesus said to him, 'If you can! All things are possible for one who believes.'
And this is not your own doing; it is the gift of God, not a result of works, so that no one may boast.
For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus for good works, which God prepared beforehand, that we should walk in them.

I have been crucified with Christ. It is no longer I who live, but Christ who lives in me. And the life I now live in the flesh I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave himself for me.
Your faith has healed you; go in peace.
All things are possible for one who believes.
Let not your heart be troubled; believe in God, believe also in me.
If you have faith as a mustard seed, you can move mountains.
According to your faith let it be done to you.
Take heart, your faith has made you well.
Do not be afraid; only believe.
Receive your sight; your faith has healed you.
Your faith is great; let it be done for you as you wish.
If you believe, you will receive whatever you ask for in prayer.
Did I not tell you that if you believe, you will see the glory of God?
Blessed are those who have not seen and yet have believed.

Have faith in God. Truly, I say to you, whoever says to this mountain, 'Be taken up and thrown into the sea,' and does not doubt in his heart, but believes that what he says will come to pass, it will be done for him.
Come to me, all who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
I am the light of the world. Whoever follows me will not walk in darkness, but will have the light of life.
I am the resurrection and the life. Whoever believes in me, though he die, yet shall he live.
I am the way, and the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.
Whoever lives by believing in me will never die. Do you believe this?
Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened to you.
If you remain in me and my words remain in you, ask whatever you wish, and it will be done for you.
You did not choose me, but I chose you and appointed you so that you might go and bear fruit—fruit that will last—and so that whatever you ask in my name the Father will give you.
Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. Not as the world gives do I give to you. Let not your hearts be troubled, neither let them be afraid.
In this world you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world.
I have told you these things, so that in me you may have peace.
Everyone who looks to the Son and believes in him shall have eternal life, and I will raise them up at the last day.
I am the bread of life. Whoever comes to me will never go hungry, and whoever believes in me will never be thirsty.
If you hold to my teaching, you are really my disciples.
Remain in me, as I also remain in you. No branch can bear fruit by itself; it must remain in the vine. Neither can you bear fruit unless you remain in me.
I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.
Do not let your hearts be troubled. You believe in God; believe also in me.
My Father’s house has many rooms; if that were not so, would I have told you that I am going there to prepare a place for you?
And I will do whatever you ask in my name, so that the Father may be glorified in the Son.
You are the light of the world. A town built on a hill cannot be hidden.
I am victorious through Christ who strengthens me.
I am more than a conqueror in all challenges through Him who loves me.
I am walking by faith, not by sight, trusting in God's plan.
I am standing firm in faith, unshaken by the trials of this world.
I am shielded by God's power, my faith extinguishing all the flaming arrows of the evil one.
I am strong in the Lord and in the power of His might, fully armored for battle.
I am a warrior of light, fearlessly advancing the kingdom of God.
I am fearless, for my God is with me wherever I go.
I am rooted and established in love, comprehending the vastness of Christ's love for me.
I am not anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, I present my requests to God.
I am constantly renewed in the spirit of my mind, wearing the new self created after the likeness of God.
I am a light to the world, a city on a hill that cannot be hidden.
I am not conformed to this world, but transformed by the renewal of my mind.
I am boldly approaching the throne of grace, receiving mercy and finding grace in time of need.
I am running with endurance the race set before me, fixing my eyes on Jesus, the author and perfecter of my faith.
I am bearing fruit in every season, my leaf does not wither, and in everything I do, I prosper.
I am steadfast, immovable, always abounding in the work of the Lord, knowing my labor is not in vain.
I am filled with the knowledge of His will in all spiritual wisdom and understanding.
I am the righteousness of God in Christ Jesus, living by faith.
I am casting all my anxieties on Him, for He cares for me.
I am chosen by God, holy and dearly loved, clothed with compassion, kindness, humility, gentleness, and patience.
I am praying without ceasing, giving thanks in all circumstances.
I am an ambassador for Christ, God making His appeal through me.
I am set free in Christ, living under the law of the Spirit of life.
I am building my life on the solid rock of Christ's teachings, unshaken by the storms.
I am renewed in strength, mounting up with wings like eagles, running and not growing weary, walking and not fainting.
I am wearing the full armor of God, able to stand against the wiles of the devil.
I am overcoming evil with good, not repaying evil for evil, but giving thought to do what is honorable in the sight of all.
I am a doer of the Word, not a hearer only, acting on what I believe.
I am the temple of the Holy Spirit, living a life led by the Spirit of God.
I am walking in the Spirit, producing the fruit of the Spirit in all aspects of my life.
I am called to freedom, serving one another through love.
I am keeping my mind stayed on Him, trusting in Him, and thus I am in perfect peace.
For it is by believing in your heart that you are made right with God, and it is by openly declaring your faith that you are saved.

And Jesus answered them, 'Truly, I say to you, if you have faith and do not doubt, you will not only do what has been done to the fig tree, but even if you say to this mountain, 'Be taken up and thrown into the sea,' it will happen.'
I approach life with unwavering faith, knowing that God exists and rewards my heartfelt pursuit of Him.
My faith and loyalty is in God alone.
If you openly declare that Jesus is Lord and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead, you will be saved.
Jesus is my vine, and in Him, I am nourished and fruitful. Apart from Him, I am nothing, but with Him, I flourish.
Jesus is the architect of my future, holding plans of hope and promise. In Him, I find my purpose and my destiny.

I have been crucified with Christ, and it is no longer I who live, but Christ lives in me. That life which I now live in the flesh, I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself up for me.
Jesus is the reason I stand strong, conquering every challenge with faith.
Jesus is my unwavering connection to the Father; when I believe and pray, all things are possible.
Jesus is my bridge from darkness to light, assuring me eternal life through faith.
I Trust in the LORD with all my heart and lean not on my own understanding.
I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.
The LORD is on my side; I will not fear. What can man do to me?
But blessed is the one who trusts in the LORD, whose confidence is in him.
But the LORD is faithful. He will establish you and guard you against the evil one.
My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in your weakness.
Now faith is being sure we will get what we hope for. It is being sure of what we cannot see.
I can do all this through him who gives me strength.
I am strong and courageous, for the Lord my God is with me.
I am an overcomer because greater is He that is in me than he that is in the world.
I am confident in God's promises, persuaded that He is able.
I am blessed, for I trust in the Lord and have made Him my hope and confidence.
I am bold, for the righteous are as bold as a lion.
I am assured, for I walk by faith, not by sight.
I am anchored in Christ, the solid rock on which I stand.
I am confident to face challenges, for God is my refuge and strength.
I am sure-footed, for God makes my steps firm.
I am secure in God's calling and purpose for my life.
With Jesus, I am fearless about what the future holds.
I am confident because I am in Christ, my eternal rock.
Through Jesus, I am empowered to confidently pursue my dreams.
God’s promises are my confidence in an uncertain world.
With Jesus, I am more than a conqueror in all situations.
In me, you may have peace. In the world you will have tribulation. But take heart; I have overcome the world.
I am with you always, even unto the end of the world.
Do not let your hearts be troubled. Trust in God; trust also in me.
Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened to you.
If you believe, you will receive whatever you ask for in prayer.
Come to me, all who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
Let your light shine before others, that they may see your good deeds and glorify your Father in heaven.
I have given you authority to trample on snakes and scorpions and to overcome all the power of the enemy; nothing will harm you.
Your faith has healed you. Go in peace and be freed from your suffering.
Do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself. Each day has enough trouble of its own.
With man this is impossible, but with God all things are possible.
Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. Not as the world gives do I give to you. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.
I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.
Take heart, daughter; your faith has made you well.
Everyone who hears these words of mine and puts them into practice is like a wise man who built his house on the rock.
Do not be afraid; just believe.
I tell you, do not worry about your life, what you will eat; or about your body, what you will wear.
Whoever lives by believing in me will never die. Do you believe this?
You did not choose me, but I chose you and appointed you so that you might go and bear fruit—fruit that will last.
I have told you these things, so that in me you may have peace. In this world you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world.
If you hold to my teaching, you are really my disciples.
Truly I tell you, if you have faith as small as a mustard seed, you can say to this mountain, 'Move from here to there,' and it will move. Nothing will be impossible for you.
The LORD is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.
Cast all your anxiety on Him because He cares for you.
Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
For I know the plans I have for you, declares the LORD, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.
The LORD is my shepherd, I lack nothing. He makes me lie down in green pastures, he leads me beside quiet waters, he refreshes my soul.
Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.
Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.
I can do all this through him who gives me strength.
Why, my soul, are you downcast? Why so disturbed within me? Put your hope in God, for I will yet praise him, my Savior and my God.
He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.
But those who hope in the LORD will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.
You will keep in perfect peace those whose minds are steadfast, because they trust in you.
So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
Therefore we do not lose heart. Though outwardly we are wasting away, yet inwardly we are being renewed day by day.
May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace as you trust in him, so that you may overflow with hope by the power of the Holy Spirit.
Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.
He will wipe every tear from their eyes. There will be no more death or mourning or crying or pain, for the old order of things has passed away.
Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid or terrified because of them, for the LORD your God goes with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you.
The righteous cry out, and the LORD hears them; he delivers them from all their troubles.
But the Lord stood at my side and gave me strength.
Weeping may stay for the night, but rejoicing comes in the morning.
My comfort in my suffering is this: Your promise preserves my life.
Come to me, all who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.
My peace I give to you; not as the world gives do I give to you. Let not your hearts be troubled, neither let them be afraid.
In the world you will have tribulation. But take heart; I have overcome the world.
I am the light of the world. Whoever follows me will not walk in darkness, but will have the light of life.
If you abide in me, and my words abide in you, ask whatever you wish, and it will be done for you.
Do not let your hearts be troubled. Trust in God; trust also in me.
I have told you these things so that in me you may have peace.
Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened to you.
Let not your hearts be troubled, neither let them be afraid.
I am the resurrection and the life. Whoever believes in me, though he die, yet shall he live.
Everyone who lives and believes in me shall never die. Do you believe this?
I am the bread of life; whoever comes to me shall not hunger, and whoever believes in me shall never thirst.
Whoever follows me will not walk in darkness, but will have the light of life.
Your faith has made you well; go in peace.
Take heart, daughter; your faith has healed you.
Do not be anxious about your life, what you will eat or what you will drink, nor about your body, what you will put on.
I am the way, and the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.
I am the vine; you are the branches. Whoever abides in me and I in him, he it is that bears much fruit, for apart from me you can do nothing.
Peace I leave with you; my peace I give to you. Let not your hearts be troubled, neither let them be afraid.
Take my yoke upon you, and learn from me, for I am gentle and lowly in heart, and you will find rest for your souls.
You are the light of the world. A city set on a hill cannot be hidden.
I tell you, my friends, do not be afraid of those who kill the body and after that can do no more.
Therefore I tell you, do not worry about your life, what you will eat; or about your body, what you will wear.
Are not five sparrows sold for two pennies? Yet not one of them is forgotten by God.
Indeed, the very hairs of your head are all numbered. Don't be afraid; you are worth more than many sparrows.
Do not worry about your life, what you will eat or what you will drink, nor about your body, what you will put on.
You did not choose me, but I chose you and appointed you that you should go and bear fruit and that your fruit should abide.
In me, you may have peace. In the world, you will have tribulation, but take courage; I have overcome the world.
Let your heart be not troubled; believe in God, believe also in me.
I am with you always, to the very end of the age. Do not be afraid.
My joy I give to you, that your joy may be full. Your sorrow will turn into joy.
Take heart, for I have overcome the world. In me, you may have peace.
Trust in me with all your heart; I will direct your paths and light your way.
You are precious in my sight. I have called you by name; you are mine.
I am victorious, for greater is He that is in me than he that is in the world.
I am being transformed by the renewal of my mind, proving what is the good, acceptable, and perfect will of God.
I am bearing fruit in every season, my leaf does not wither, and whatever I do prospers.
I am joyful in hope, patient in affliction, faithful in prayer.
I am casting all my anxieties on Him, for He cares for me deeply.
I am standing on the promises of God, my solid foundation in every storm.
I am renewed day by day, letting go of the old and embracing the new.
I am filled with the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding.
I am a child of God, fearfully and wonderfully made, destined for great things.
I am clothed with strength and dignity, and I laugh without fear of the future.
I am set free, for whom the Son sets free is free indeed.
I am more than a conqueror through Him who loves me.
Trust in the Lord with all your heart, and do not lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make straight your paths.
Jesus is my unbroken promise, assuring me that better days will come.
Jesus is my superhero, turning pain into power and tears into triumph.
Jesus is my fearless warrior, fighting alongside me in every battle.
Jesus is my safest space, where every emotion is valid and respected.
